string.comment: General string which is used when a preference has the default value set

string.comment: General string which is used when a preference has the system default value set

string.name: settings__home__ime_not_enabled
string.comment: Error message shown in Home fragment when FlorisBoard is not enabled in the system

resources.string: FlorisBoard is not enabled in the system and thus won\'t be available as an input method in the input picker. Click here to resolve this issue.

string.name: settings__home__ime_not_selected
string.comment: Warning message shown in Home fragment when FlorisBoard is not selected as the default keyboard

resources.string: FlorisBoard is not selected as the default input method. Click here to resolve this issue.

string.name: settings__home__contribute
string.comment: Contributing message shown in Home fragment

resources.string: Thanks for trying out FlorisBoard! This project is still in alpha and therefore missing features. If you find any bugs or want to make a suggestion, please check out the repo on GitHub and file an issue. This helps making FlorisBoard better. Thank you!

string.name: settings__localization__title
string.comment: Title of languages and layout box in the Typing fragment

string.name: settings__localization__subtype_no_subtypes_configured_warning
string.comment: Warning message that no subtype has been defined in the Typing fragment

resources.string: It seems that you haven\'t configured any subtypes. As a fallback the subtype English/QWERTY will be used!

string.name: settings__theme_editor__error_theme_label_empty
string.comment: Error text for an empty theme label

string.name: settings__theme_editor__error_group_name
string.comment: Error text for an invalid group name

resources.string: Please enter a group name which only contain letters (a–z and/or A–Z), colons (:) for sub–grouping or additionally numbers (0–9), tilde (~) and underlines (_) for the key label.

string.name: settings__theme_editor__error_group_name_empty
string.comment: Error text for an empty group name

string.name: settings__theme_editor__error_group_name_already_exists
string.comment: Error text for a duplicate group name

resources.string: This group name already exists within this theme. Please choose another one.

string.name: settings__theme_editor__error_attr_name
string.comment: Error text for an invalid attribute name

resources.string: Please enter an attribute name which only contain the letters a-z and/or A-Z.

string.name: settings__theme_editor__error_attr_name_empty
string.comment: Error text for an empty attribute name

string.name: settings__theme_editor__error_attr_name_already_exists
string.comment: Error text for a duplicate attribute name

resources.string: This attribute name already exists within this group. Please specify another one.

string.name: settings__theme__group_key_specific
string.comment: Theme group label (%s is specific modifier)

string.name: settings__theme__group_custom
string.comment: Theme group label (%s is custom group name)

string.name: settings__theme__attr_custom
string.comment: Theme attribute label (%s is custom attribute name)

resources.string: Show number row on top of character layout
Shows a configurable utility key next to space bar
Dynamic: Switch to emojis / Switch language
Show popup when you press a key
Space bar switches back to character layout
Pressing space bar automatically switches back to characters when in symbols or numeric
Will show on top of the keyboard
Will show in the Smartbar, currently regardless of the selected subtype the dictionary language is English (US)
Use previous words for generating suggestions
Prevents possibly offensive words from being suggested while you type
Suggest clipboard content to paste if previously copied
Capitalize words based on the current input context
Caps lock will stay on when moving to another text field
Tapping twice on spacebar inserts a period followed by a space
Type in a word by sliding your finger through its letters
Move cursor to start of line
Move cursor to end of line
Move cursor to start of page
Move cursor to end of page

resources.string: Are you sure you want to discard any unsaved changes? This action can not be undone once executed.
Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\"? This action can not be undone once executed.

string.name: setup__prev_button
string.comment: Label of Previous button in Setup (try to find a short translation due to limited space in UI)

string.name: setup__cancel_button
string.comment: Label of Cancel button in Setup

string.name: setup__next_button
string.comment: Label of Next button in Setup (try to find a short translation due to limited space in UI)

string.name: setup__finish_button
string.comment: Label of Finish button in Setup

string.name: setup__ok_button
string.comment: Label of OK button in Setup

string.name: setup__welcome__title
string.comment: Title of Welcome fragment in Setup

string.name: setup__welcome__intro
string.comment: Paragraph in Welcome fragment in Setup

resources.string: Thanks for trying out FlorisBoard! Before you can start using it, we have to do the usual stuff and enable it in the system settings, set up your preferred language/layout, etc… But no worries - the setup wizard will guide you through this!

string.name: setup__welcome__privacy
string.comment: Paragraph in Welcome fragment in Setup

resources.string: FlorisBoard does fully respect your privacy and does not collect any user data. For more info see here:

string.name: setup__welcome__trust
string.comment: Paragraph in Welcome fragment in Setup

resources.string: The source code for FlorisBoard is publicly accessible for anyone, so you can easily review what FlorisBoard does in the background. Check out the repository link below.

string.name: setup__welcome__contribute
string.comment: Paragraph in Welcome fragment in Setup

resources.string: One last thing before you start the setup - if you encounter any bugs/crashes/issues with FlorisBoard or you have a feature request - head over to the GitHub repository linked below and file an issue. This helps in improving the experience for all users!

string.name: setup__welcome__outro
string.comment: Paragraph in Welcome fragment in Setup

resources.string: To start the setup, click on NEXT.

string.name: setup__enable_ime__title
string.comment: Title of Enable IME fragment in Setup

string.name: setup__enable_ime__text_before_enabled
string.comment: Description of state in Enable IME fragment before user enabled

resources.string: Android requires that every custom keyboard has to be manually enabled before you can use it. Click the button below to go to the Language & Input settings, then make sure to check \'FlorisBoard\'.

string.name: setup__enable_ime__text_after_enabled
string.comment: Description of state in Enable IME fragment after user enabled

resources.string: FlorisBoard has been successfully enabled. To continue click NEXT!

string.name: setup__enable_ime__text_button_language_and_input
string.comment: Label of language and input button in Enable IME fragment

string.name: setup__make_default__title
string.comment: Title of Make IME default fragment in Setup

string.name: setup__make_default__text_before_switch
string.comment: Description of state in Make IME default fragment before user switched

resources.string: FlorisBoard is now enabled in your system. To actively use it, switch to FlorisBoard by selecting it in the input selector dialog!

string.name: setup__make_default__text_after_switch
string.comment: Description of state in Make IME default fragment after user switched

resources.string: Successfully switched the default keyboard to FlorisBoard!

string.name: setup__make_default__text_switch_button
string.comment: Label of switch button in Make IME default fragment

string.name: setup__finish__title
string.comment: Title of Setup finished fragment in Setup

resources.string: Sorry for the inconvenience, but FlorisBoard has crashed due to an unexpected error.

string.name: crash_dialog__report_instructions
string.comment: Issue tracker report instructions for the crash dialog. The %s placeholder is the name of the crash report template and always in English/LTR.

resources.string: If you wish to report this error, first check out the issue tracker on GitHub if your crash has not already been reported.\nIf it hasn\'t, copy the generated crash log and open a new issue. Use the \"%s\" template and fill out the description, the steps to reproduce, and paste the generated crash log at the end. This helps in making FlorisBoard better and more stable for everyone. Thank you!

string.name: crash_dialog__bug_report_template
string.comment: Name of the template to use in the GitHub issue tracker (is always in English)

string.name: crash_dialog__copy_to_clipboard
string.comment: Label of Copy to clipboard button in crash dialog

string.name: crash_dialog__copy_to_clipboard_success
string.comment: Label of Copy to clipboard success message in crash dialog

string.name: crash_dialog__copy_to_clipboard_failure
string.comment: Label of Copy to clipboard failure message in crash dialog

resources.string: Cannot copy to system clipboard: Clipboard manager instance not found

string.name: crash_dialog__open_issue_tracker
string.comment: Label of Open issue tracker button in crash dialog

string.name: crash_dialog__close
string.comment: Label of Close button in crash dialog

string.name: crash_once_notification__title
string.comment: Title of the notification for a single crash

string.name: crash_once_notification__body
string.comment: Body of the notification for a single crash

string.name: crash_multiple_notification__title
string.comment: Title of the notification for consecutive crashes

resources.string: FlorisBoard seems to stop working repeatedly…

string.name: crash_multiple_notification__body
string.comment: Body of the notification for consecutive crashes

resources.string: Falling back to previous keyboard to stop infinite crash loop. Tap to view error details
This app doesn\'t allow pasting this content.
Use an internal clipboard instead of the system clipboard
System clipboard updates also update Floris clipboard
Floris clipboard updates also update system clipboard
